Message:
But, I was only met
with her frigid glare...

In her eyes,
I was nothing more
than a monster.

she said, raising her
sword towards me.

You would never say
something so horrible!

No matter what happens,
I’ll believe in her.
I trusted her with all my heart,

so I held my arms wide open
as she approached me.

without even hesitating,
she took her sword...
is that she did this to me.

I stretched my hand
towards her as
she walked away,

but not once did
she look back.
